description:
Karine Jean-Pierre will soon be out of a job but that does not mean she is going to leave her current one without the worst takes yet.

According to your favorite DEI hire, circumstances have changed, which is why Sleepy Joe pardoned his drug-addicted son and why he also might pardon a bunch of other people who have yet to be charged with any crimes.

NEW: Karine Jean-Pierre says she preemptively won’t talk about Biden’s potential preemptive pardons.

KJP also defended Biden’s decision to pardon Hunter because “circumstances have changed.”

“The fact is, when you think about how the president got to this decision,… pic.twitter.com/zDprOF9Uok
— Collin Rugg (@CollinRugg)
title: Watch: KJP doubles down on lying about Joe Biden pardoning hunter, plus she gets polling wrong

description:
The Kamala campaign assumed that calling Trump a “threat to democracy” would serve them well at the ballot box. However, the exact opposite proved to be true but Tim Walz cannot handle the truth.

Walz said he could not comprehend why no one believed his lies when he called Trump literally Hitler.

Tim Walz is completely stunned that Americans didn’t buy into their “threat to democracy” message.

pic.twitter.com/EF0XLPN2rg
— The Post Millennial (@TPostMillennial) December 6, 2024

LOL. And he is doubling down, as
title: Watch: Tim Walz Is SHOCKED Voters Did Not believe Trump Was Literally Hitler
